page.title: 15A Saturday Morning
page.content:
I am thirteen years old and live in Northdown Road.I usualy get up at around ten 'o'clock and go downstairs in my pyjamas and dressing gown. Breakfast is a cup of coffee and Weetabix with sugar and milk.I eat this while watching television-either Saturday Super Store or cartoons. I get washed and dressed when something boring comes on . When I am dressed I either continue watching TV or go down Longfield Ave. where people keep their
horses and help or watch . You can keep your horse there and pay full livery which is Â£18.00 per week or you can go D.I.Y. at Â£12.50 per week and do your own mucking out. At about 12.30 I go back home for lunch with my mum,dad and sister,and this might be toasted sandwiches or fish and chips.
